articles.author: Daniel Orme
articles.title: Carlo Ancelotti has already hinted at how easily Liverpool could beat Real Madrid - The Mirror
articles.description: Liverpool head to Paris aiming to lift their seventh European Cup at the expense of Real Madrid and judging from Carlo Ancelotti’s previous comments, it could potentially be a straightforward evening for the Reds
articles.content:
Real Madrid boss Carlo Ancelotti has already dropped a huge hint to Liverpool over how the Reds could beat them in the Champions League final. 
 The two sides come together in the French capital Par… [+2567 chars]
